register.name: DAUTHCTRL
register.description: This register allows the IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED authentication interface to be overridden from software

register.name: DCRDR
register.description: With the DCRSR, provides debug access to the general-purpose registers, special-purpose registers, and the FP Extension registers. If the Main Extension is implemented, it can also be used for message passing between an external debugger and a debug agent running on the PE

register.name: DCRSR
register.description: With the DCRDR, provides debug access to the general-purpose registers, special-purpose registers, and the FP extension registers. A write to the DCRSR specifies the register to transfer, whether the transfer is a read or write, and starts the transfer

register.name: DEMCR
register.gui_name: Debug Exception and Monitor Control Register
register.description: Manages vector catch behavior and DebugMonitor handling when debugging

register.name: DHCSR
register.gui_name: Debug Halting Control and Status Register

register.name: DSCSR
register.gui_name: Debug Security Control and Status Register
register.description: Provides control and status information for Secure debug

tcf:enumItem.description: Secure Non-invasive debug prohibited
tcf:enumItem.name: Secure_Non_invasive_debug_prohibited

tcf:enumItem.description: Secure Non-invasive debug allowed
tcf:enumItem.name: Secure_Non_invasive_debug_allowed

tcf:enumItem.description: Secure non-invasive debug controlled by the IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED external authentication interface. In the CoreSight authentication interface, this is controlled by the SPNIDEN signal
tcf:enumItem.name: Secure_non_invasive_debug_controlled_by_the_IMPLEMENTATION_DEFINED_external_authentication_interface

tcf:enumItem.description: Secure non-invasive debug controlled by DAUTHCTRL.INTSPNIDEN
tcf:enumItem.name: Secure_non_invasive_debug_controlled_by_DAUTHCTRL

tcf:enumItem.description: Secure halting and self-hosted debug prohibited
tcf:enumItem.name: Secure_halting_and_self_hosted_debug_prohibited

tcf:enumItem.description: Secure halting and self-hosted debug allowed
tcf:enumItem.name: Secure_halting_and_self_hosted_debug_allowed

tcf:enumItem.description: Secure halting and self-hosted debug controlled by the IMPLEMENTATION DEFINED external authentication interface. In the CoreSight authentication interface, both are controlled by the SPIDEN signal
tcf:enumItem.name: Secure_halting_and_self_hosted_debug_controlled_by_the_IMPLEMENTATION_DEFINED_external_authentication_interface

tcf:enumItem.description: Secure halting and self-hosted debug controlled by DAUTHCTRL.INTSPIDEN
tcf:enumItem.name: Secure_halting_and_self_hosted_debug_controlled_by_DAUTHCTRL

tcf:enumItem.description: General-purpose registers R0-R12
tcf:enumItem.name: General_purpose_registers_R0_R12

tcf:enumItem.description: Current stack pointer, SP
tcf:enumItem.name: Current_stack_pointer_SP

tcf:enumItem.description: Current state main stack pointer, SP_main
tcf:enumItem.name: Current_state_main_stack_pointer_SP_main

tcf:enumItem.description: Current state process stack pointer, SP_process
tcf:enumItem.name: Current_state_process_stack_pointer_SP_process

tcf:enumItem.description: Current state CONTROL[7:0],FAULTMASK[7:0],BASEPRI[7:0],PRIMASK[7:0]. If the Main Extension is not implemented, bits [23:8] of the transfer value are RES0.
tcf:enumItem.name: Current_state_CONTROL_7_0_FAULTMASK_7_0_BASEPRI_7_0_PRIMASK_7_0

tcf:enumItem.description: Non-secure main stack pointer, MSP_NS. If the Security Extension is not implemented, this value is reserved.
tcf:enumItem.name: Non_secure_main_stack_pointer_MSP_NS

tcf:enumItem.description: Non-secure process stack pointer, PSP_NS. If the Security Extension is not implemented, this value is reserved.
tcf:enumItem.name: Non_secure_process_stack_pointer_PSP_NS

tcf:enumItem.description: Secure main stack pointer, MSP_S. Accessible only when DHCSR.S_SDE == 1. If the Security Extension is not implemented, this value is reserved.
tcf:enumItem.name: Secure_main_stack_pointer_MSP_S

tcf:enumItem.description: Secure process stack pointer, PSP_S. Accessible only when DHCSR.S_SDE == 1. If the Security Extension is not implemented, this value is reserved.
tcf:enumItem.name: Secure_process_stack_pointer_PSP_S

tcf:enumItem.description: Secure main stack limit, MSPLIM_S. Accessible only when DHCSR.S_SDE == 1. If the Security Extension is not implemented, this value is reserved.
tcf:enumItem.name: Secure_main_stack_limit_MSPLIM_S

tcf:enumItem.description: Secure process stack limit, PSPLIM_S. Accessible only when DHCSR.S_SDE == 1. If the Security Extension is not implemented, this value is reserved.
tcf:enumItem.name: Secure_process_stack_limit_PSPLIM_S

tcf:enumItem.description: Non-secure main stack limit, MSPLIM_NS. If the Main Extension is not implemented, this value is reserved.
tcf:enumItem.name: Non_secure_main_stack_limit_MSPLIM_NS

tcf:enumItem.description: Non-secure process stack limit, PSPLIM_NS. If the Main Extension is not implemented, this value is reserved.
tcf:enumItem.name: Non_secure_process_stack_limit_PSPLIM_NS

tcf:enumItem.description: FPSCR. If the Floating-point Extension is not implemented, this value is reserved.
tcf:enumItem.name: FPSCR

tcf:enumItem.description: CONTROL[7:0],FAULTMASK[7:0],BASEPRI[7:0],PRIMASK[7:0]_S. If the Main Extension is not implemented, bits [23:8] of the transfer value are RES0. If the Security Extension is not implemented, this value is reserved.
tcf:enumItem.name: CONTROL_7_0_FAULTMASK_7_0_BASEPRI_7_0_PRIMASK_7_0_S

tcf:enumItem.description: CONTROL[7:0],FAULTMASK[7:0],BASEPRI[7:0],PRIMASK[7:0]_NS. If the Main Extension is not implemented, bits [23:8] of the transfer value are RES0. If the Security Extension is not implemented, this value is reserved.
tcf:enumItem.name: CONTROL_7_0_FAULTMASK_7_0_BASEPRI_7_0_PRIMASK_7_0_NS

tcf:enumItem.description: FP registers, S0-S31. If the Floating-point Extension is not implemented, these values are reserved.
tcf:enumItem.name: FP_registers_S0_S31

tcf:enumItem.description: DWT and ITM features disabled
tcf:enumItem.name: DWT_and_ITM_features_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: DWT and ITM features enabled
tcf:enumItem.name: DWT_and_ITM_features_enabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Debug events prohibited in Secure state and the DebugMonitor exception targets Non-secure state
tcf:enumItem.name: Debug_events_prohibited_in_Secure_state_and_the_DebugMonitor_exception_targets_Non_secure_state

tcf:enumItem.description: Debug events allowed in Secure state and the DebugMonitor exception targets Secure state
tcf:enumItem.name: Debug_events_allowed_in_Secure_state_and_the_DebugMonitor_exception_targets_Secure_state

tcf:enumItem.name: Stepping_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Stepping enabled
tcf:enumItem.name: Stepping_enabled

tcf:enumItem.name: Clear_the_status_of_the_DebugMonitor_exception_to_not_pending

tcf:enumItem.description: Set the status of the DebugMonitor exception to pending
tcf:enumItem.name: Set_the_status_of_the_DebugMonitor_exception_to_pending

tcf:enumItem.name: DebugMonitor_exception_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: DebugMonitor exception enabled
tcf:enumItem.name: DebugMonitor_exception_enabled

tcf:enumItem.name: Halting_debug_trap_on_SecureFault_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Halting debug trap on SecureFault enabled
tcf:enumItem.name: Halting_debug_trap_on_SecureFault_enabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Halting debug trap on HardFault enabled
tcf:enumItem.name: Halting_debug_trap_on_HardFault_enabled

tcf:enumItem.name: Halting_debug_trap_on_faults_during_exception_entry_and_return_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Halting debug trap on faults during exception entry and return enabled
tcf:enumItem.name: Halting_debug_trap_on_faults_during_exception_entry_and_return_enabled

tcf:enumItem.name: Halting_debug_trap_on_BusFault_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Halting debug trap on BusFault enabled

tcf:enumItem.name: Halting_debug_trap_on_UsageFault_caused_by_state_information_error_disabled

tcf:enumItem.name: Halting_debug_trap_on_UsageFault_caused_by_state_information_error_enabled

tcf:enumItem.name: Halting_debug_trap_on_UsageFault_caused_by_checking_error_disabled

tcf:enumItem.name: Halting_debug_trap_on_UsageFault_caused_by_checking_error_enabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Halting debug trap on UsageFault caused by access to a coprocessor disabled
tcf:enumItem.name: Halting_debug_trap_on_UsageFault_caused_by_access_to_a_coprocessor_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Halting debug trap on UsageFault caused by access to a coprocessor enabled
tcf:enumItem.name: Halting_debug_trap_on_UsageFault_caused_by_access_to_a_coprocessor_enabled

tcf:enumItem.name: Halting_debug_trap_on_MemManage_disabled

tcf:enumItem.name: Halting_debug_trap_on_MemManage_enabled

tcf:enumItem.name: Halting_debug_trap_on_reset_disabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Halting debug trap on reset enabled
tcf:enumItem.name: Halting_debug_trap_on_reset_enabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Writes accompanied by this value update bits[15:0]
tcf:enumItem.name: Writes_accompanied_by_this_value_update_bits_15_0

tcf:enumItem.description: Write ignored
tcf:enumItem.name: Write_ignored

tcf:enumItem.description: PE has not left Debug state since the last read of DHCSR
tcf:enumItem.name: PE_has_not_left_Debug_state_since_the_last_read_of_DHCSR

tcf:enumItem.description: PE has left Debug state since the last read of DHCSR
tcf:enumItem.name: PE_has_left_Debug_state_since_the_last_read_of_DHCSR

tcf:enumItem.description: No reset since last DHCSR read
tcf:enumItem.name: No_reset_since_last_DHCSR_read

tcf:enumItem.description: At least one reset since last DHCSR read
tcf:enumItem.name: At_least_one_reset_since_last_DHCSR_read

tcf:enumItem.description: No instruction retired since last DHCSR read
tcf:enumItem.name: No_instruction_retired_since_last_DHCSR_read

tcf:enumItem.description: At least one instruction retired since last DHCSR read
tcf:enumItem.name: At_least_one_instruction_retired_since_last_DHCSR_read

tcf:enumItem.name: Secure_invasive_debug_prohibited

tcf:enumItem.name: Secure_invasive_debug_allowed

tcf:enumItem.description: Not locked up
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_locked_up

tcf:enumItem.description: Locked up
tcf:enumItem.name: Locked_up

tcf:enumItem.description: Not sleeping
tcf:enumItem.name: Not_sleeping

tcf:enumItem.description: In Non-debug state
tcf:enumItem.name: In_Non_debug_state

tcf:enumItem.description: In Debug state
tcf:enumItem.name: In_Debug_state

tcf:enumItem.description: Write to DCRSR performed, but transfer not yet complete
tcf:enumItem.name: Write_to_DCRSR_performed_but_transfer_not_yet_complete

tcf:enumItem.description: Transfer complete, or no outstanding transfer
tcf:enumItem.name: Transfer_complete_or_no_outstanding_transfer

tcf:enumItem.description: No action
tcf:enumItem.name: No_action

tcf:enumItem.description: Allow imprecise entry to Debug state, for example by forcing any stalled load or store instruction to be abandoned
tcf:enumItem.name: Allow_imprecise_entry_to_Debug_state_for_example_by_forcing_any_stalled_load_or_store_instruction_to_be_abandoned

tcf:enumItem.description: Do not mask
tcf:enumItem.name: Do_not_mask

tcf:enumItem.description: Mask PendSV, SysTick and external configurable interrupts
tcf:enumItem.name: Mask_PendSV_SysTick_and_external_configurable_interrupts

tcf:enumItem.description: No effect
tcf:enumItem.name: No_effect

tcf:enumItem.description: Single step enabled
tcf:enumItem.name: Single_step_enabled

tcf:enumItem.description: Causes the PE to leave Debug state, if in Debug state
tcf:enumItem.name: Causes_the_PE_to_leave_Debug_state_if_in_Debug_state

tcf:enumItem.description: Halt the PE
tcf:enumItem.name: Halt_the_PE

tcf:enumItem.description: Concurrent write to CDS not ignored
tcf:enumItem.name: Concurrent_write_to_CDS_not_ignored

tcf:enumItem.description: Concurrent write to CDS ignored
tcf:enumItem.name: Concurrent_write_to_CDS_ignored

tcf:enumItem.description: PE is in Non-secure state
tcf:enumItem.name: PE_is_in_Non_secure_state

tcf:enumItem.description: PE is in Secure state
tcf:enumItem.name: PE_is_in_Secure_state

tcf:enumItem.description: Selects the Non-secure versions
tcf:enumItem.name: Selects_the_Non_secure_versions

tcf:enumItem.description: Selects the Secure versions
tcf:enumItem.name: Selects_the_Secure_versions

tcf:enumItem.description: The current Security state of the PE determines which memory-mapped Banked registers are accessed by the debugger.
tcf:enumItem.name: The_current_Security_state_of_the_PE_determines_which_memory_mapped_Banked_registers_are_accessed_by_the_debugger

tcf:enumItem.description: DSCSR.SBRSEL selects which memory-mapped Banked registers are accessed by the debugger.
tcf:enumItem.name: DSCSR
